txt.en: The grounds of the Lost Temple are being desecrated by mercenaries working for Fernd√∫r the Virulent.\n\nThe illness the mercenaries have contracted will soon be the end of them, but it would be best if you defeat them and ensure a quick and painless end to their suffering before they spread this dangerous illness beyond the temple's bounds.
Defeat brigands in the Lost Temple
Discover the entrance to the Lost Temple
To earn this deed you must defeat many of the sellswords who are attempting to loot the Lost Temple.
The sellswords and brigands looting the ruins of the Lost Temple fear your wrath.
